about.heading: Hi, I'm
about.name: Amardeep Dwivedi
about.description: I am a MERN stack developer with over 2 years of experience building scalable, performant full-stack web applications. I specialize in React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express. I enjoy building modern UIs, integrating APIs, and optimizing performance.I am a MERN stack developer with over 2 years of experience building scalable, performant full-stack web applications. 0.description: Contributed to the development of scalable and high-performance web applications using React.js and the MERN stack. Implemented reusable components, optimized frontend performance, and integrated REST APIs. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver client projects on time with a focus on clean code and responsive design.

1.description: Focused on frontend development with React.js and Bootstrap to build interactive and responsive user interfaces. Worked on API integration, debugging, and performance improvements. Gained hands-on experience in Agile workflows and enhanced collaboration with senior developers to ensure smooth project execution.
